description: This file defines data models and enums related to wallet entries in a financial tracking application. It includes the WalletType enum for distinguishing income and expense entries, the WalletEntryFields class which holds database column names, and the WalletEntry class which models a financial record with methods for database serialization and deserialization, copying, and string representation.

classes.name: WalletType
classes.description: Enum representing the two types of wallet entries: income and expense, with methods to convert to and from database integer values.

classes.name: WalletEntryFields
classes.description: A class containing constants for the database table name and column names related to wallet entries.

classes.name: WalletEntry
classes.description: A class representing a wallet record, including fields for ID, type, amount, category, description, and date, with methods for database mapping, copying, and string representation.

methods.name: WalletType.toDbValue
methods.description: Converts a WalletType enum to its integer representation for database storage.

methods.name: WalletType.fromDbValue
methods.description: Parses an integer from the database back into a WalletType enum.

methods.name: WalletEntry.fromDbMap
methods.description: Creates a WalletEntry instance from a map retrieved from the database.

methods.name: WalletEntry.toDbMap
methods.description: Converts a WalletEntry into a map suitable for database insertion or update.

methods.name: WalletEntry.copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the WalletEntry with optional modified fields.
